message: The server/client does not support receiving this message type!
Bad Room. Room does not exist, or there are no connections to the desired room.
Character in use. Cannot reprise a character that is already tied to a socket.
Bad Monster. Cannot loot a nonexistent, not present, or living monster.
Stat error. Cannot accept inappropriate player stats. Try again!
Not Ready. Caused by attempting an action too early, like changing rooms before sending START or CHARACTER.
No target. Cannot loot nonexistent characters, fight players in different rooms, or message someone offline.
No fight. Fight cannot happen for some reason, like no live monsters in room.
Player vs. player combat is currently not supported on this server.
Monster. Cannot create or reprise a monster character.
